title: Hyperlinks not working
content: I have reviewed some posts on the problem of hyperlinks not working in firefox. However I can't find a clear answer or fix. I'm using latest version of Firefox 87.0 (64 bit) on my PC (win 10) and hyperlinks suddenly stopped working a few months ago. I can' t seem to find a solution. Can you please provide guidance on how to resolve this problem. Regards Martin Birch
creator: martin.birch
